title: Weird problem with my pixel 3a touchscreen
content: I have a Google 3a. Roughly once or twice a day, the lower third of my screen will go haywire; partly unresponsive, partly oversensitive, so sometimes you press it and nothing happens, other times you try to write "Hi" and you get "Hhhhhi". Restarting the phone fixes the issue, but I don't want to have to keep doing that.
